plot: Based on a true story set in pre-war Japan, a man and one of his servants begin a torrid affair. Their desire becomes a sexual obsession so strong that to intensify their ardor, they forsake all, even life itself.   Written by  Allen Brown

lists.title: Películas para ver con aire acondicionado

plot_en: Based on a true story set in pre-war Japan, a man and one of his servants begin a torrid affair. Their desire becomes a sexual obsession so strong that to intensify their ardor, they forsake all, even life itself.   Written by  Allen Brown

title: Bagdad el imperio de los sentidos
